ca.horatiu.decanting

Class GameRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • ca.horatiu.decanting.GameRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class GameRenderer
extends android.view.View
    This class handles all graphic related tasks within the main game, drawn in a canvas. Created by Horatiu on 27/06/2016.

    • Nested Class Summary
